channel.title: Posts on Tiny Blocks
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tiny Blocks

item.title: Project Proposal: Identifying Neighbourhoods with Childhood Developmental Risk through Geospatial Analysis of Built Spaces
item.description: Children are the future of a nation’s well-being. We propose a project to geospatially analyse Singapore’s neighborhoods so as to map and understand geospatial gaps and to pinpoint child development risk areas that might require intervention.

item.title: Who are we?
item.description: A quick look at the people behind this project.
